sub_title: Newsreporter at De Gelderlander, historian, writer, trainer
summary:
Journalist with special interest and experience in history, archeology, book reviews and art.
Trainer in media and journalism.
Project manager in small scale developmental projects.
Writer of history books. Rondje Romeinen, De Nije Weg deel I en II, Grote Werken, Grote Werken Junior.
Specialties: Writing and editing, historical research, archeology (reporting), project management
